rules_text:
[i]Pretend Heros[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell that targets Conrad & Celica, they get +1/+1 and gain first strike and trample until end of turn.
[i]Impressions Lasting [/i]– Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, you may pay {2}. If you do, exile it as it resolves. Then return that card to your hand at the beginning of the next upkeep.
